channel.title: tableaux vivant – Steven Chu – Photographer & Visual Experience Designer New York
channel.description: The culture of New York, shaped through photography, iconic brand development, and community building in nightlife.

item.title: Brooklyn Framed
item.dc:creator: Steven Chu
item.description: In my early-mid 20’s here in NYC, my time split between Williamsburg and SoHo was about research […]
item.content:encoded: In my early-mid 20’s here in NYC, my time split between Williamsburg and SoHo was about research into cinema. My friend David turned me onto the tableaux vivant of Sergei Parajanov, simultaneously while my friend Brian introduced me to the work of his past partner, Derek Jarman. These are outtakes from a casual summer day on my rooftop I dug up from my archives – leading into many later shoots exploring these ideas in more depth. #tbt
